content.raw:
Note that ArduCopter plugin blocks gzserver until connection is established with ardupilot, hence the black screen. Maybe it's better to not block the server but just forcefully pause simulation instead. 

There are some instructions on setting up ardupilot in `iris_standoff_demo.world`. Oh and maybe we can rename it to just `iris_demo.world`?
content.html:
Note that ArduCopter plugin blocks gzserver until connection is established with ardupilot, hence the black screen. Maybe it's better to not block the server but just forcefully pause simulation instead.

There are some instructions on setting up ardupilot in iris_standoff_demo.world. Oh and maybe we can rename it to just iris_demo.world?
